Pre-Game Insights: The Men in Blue enter the match as clear favourites and are expected to secure a straightforward win.
However, Ireland has a reputation for staging upsets in major tournaments which makes the contest a mouthwatering affair to watch.
India will come on the back of a win in their warm-up game against Bangladesh while Ireland will play their first cricket of the season.
India will hope to get some momentum against Ireland, especially with the clash against arch-rivals Pakistan lined up next for June 9.
The Indian team will aim to break a 13-year jinx and win an ICC title after last winning it in 2011.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Nassau County International Cricket Stadium exhibits a two-paced nature, causing the ball to arrive inconsistently onto the bat compared to most T20 surfaces.
Also with the pitch being on the slower side, it is expected to favour the bowlers more.
The maximum temperature is expected to be around 27Â°C with a 20 percent chance of rain and predicted cloud cover during the game.
